law.catch_line: Administrator -- License requirements -- Service of process.

text.section: No individual or business entity shall in this state be, act as, or hold himself or herself out to be an administrator unless then licensed as an administrator by the commissioner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1043, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 4, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986.
